name: claude-hook-notifications
description: macOS desktop notifications for Claude Code hooks

scripts.plugin:install: mkdir -p ~/.claude/plugins/claude-hook-notifications && cp -r hooks .claude-plugin src package.json package-lock.json tsconfig.json ~/.claude/plugins/claude-hook-notifications/ && cd ~/.claude/plugins/claude-hook-notifications && npm install --silent && echo 'Plugin installed. Restart Claude Code to load.'

author: yusufpapurcu
